title: Bethany
description: Rich Clark is a bachelor, living in a big house that includes its own dungeon, occupying an entire converted third floor of his house. He’s been alone over a year now, when his ex, Laura, took a job transfer out of state. Normally a tidy person who doesn’t leave a mess, he still has no time to polish windows or dustoff bookshelves. He’s hired Bethany Mayford to deep-clean his house while he’s on a business trip, comfortable that the beautiful redhead will do a good job.Until an alarm goes off on his cell phone, notifying him of an intrusion inside his house. Bethany has discovered his hidden dungeon, and video shows that she’s engaged in a rather intense session of self-play, leaving Rich to wonder whether to confront Bethany, or let it go …
author: Lucas X. Black
